name: Motorbike Highway Racing 3D
description:
Motorbike Highway Racing 3D takes you through an endless fun road racing genre of traffic dashing and bike stunts that touch new extremes. Experience the exhilaration of overtaking the heavy street traffic while collecting all sorts of rewards and boosts. The riding is very smooth but its difficult to handle the highway bike. As you need to be professional to handle this motorbike.

Game Feature:

• Smooth and realistic handling and driving
• Traffic rivals includes: buses, trucks and cars
• HD 3D graphics
